message:
import requests
import logging

logging.basicConfig(level=logging.INFO, format='%(asctime)s - %(levelname)s: %(message)s')

def scrape_page(url):
    try:
        response = requests.get(url)
        if response.status_code == 200:
            return response.text
        else:
            logging.error('获取页面 %s 时获取状态码 %s', url, response.status_code)
    except requests.RequestException as e:
        logging.error('抓取页面 %s 时发生错误：%s', url, str(e))

scrape_page('https://chii.in/game/browser?sort=rank&page=1')

console里面说代理有问题(HTTPSConnectionPool(host='bangumi.tv', port=443): Max retries exceeded with url: /game/browser?sort=rank&page=1 (Caused by ProxyError('Unable to connect to proxy', RemoteDisconnected('Remote end closed connection without response'))))，难道是vscode的proxy设置问题？但是用urllib可以获取到，怪事
title: Request.get()为何无法获取bgm网页？
